recipes.zenoss::server: Installs Zenoss, handling and configuring all the dependencies while adding Device Classes, Groups, Systems and Locations.  All nodes using the `zenoss::client` recipe are added for monitoring.
recipes.zenoss::client: Includes the `openssh` recipe and adds the device to the Zenoss server for monitoring.

description: Installs and configures Zenoss and registers nodes as devices

zenoss/device/properties.description: Hash of configuration properties for the node. Node takes precendence over the Role if set.
zenoss/device/properties.display_name: Hash of configuration properties for the node.

zenoss/device/modeler_plugins.description: List of modeler plugins for the node. Node takes precendence over the Role if set.
zenoss/device/modeler_plugins.display_name: List of modeler plugins for the node.

zenoss/device/location.description: Location for the node. May be overridden by the Role.

zenoss/server/zenoss_pubkey.description: zenoss user's public key on the server for use with SSH monitoring.

zenoss/device/templates.description: List of templates for the node. Node takes precendence over the Role if set.
zenoss/device/templates.display_name: List of templates for the node.

zenoss/server/zenhome.description: $ZENHOME environment variable, directory where Zenoss is installed.

zenoss/device/device_class.description: Device Class for the node. May be overridden by the Role.

zenoss/server/installed_zenpacks.description: Hash of ZenPacks to install. Key/value of Name/Version.

zenoss/server/admin_password.description: Randomly generated password for the admin user

zenoss/server/zenpatches.description: Hash of patches to install with zenpatch. Key/value of patch number/ticket url

name: zenoss
